Source.Name: python-polib
Source.Summary: Python library to manipulate gettext files.
Source.Description: polib is a library to manipulate, create, modify gettext files (pot, po and mo files). You can load existing files, iterate through it’s entries, add, modify entries, comments or metadata, etc… or create new po files from scratch.

Package.Name: python-polib
Package.Summary: Python library to manipulate gettext files.
Package.Description: polib is a library to manipulate, create, modify gettext files (pot, po and mo files). You can load existing files, iterate through it’s entries, add, modify entries, comments or metadata, etc… or create new po files from scratch.
